aboutContent.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a passionate AI & Machine Learning Engineer with expertise in Python development and computer vision. With a strong foundation in artificial intelligence and backend technologies, I craft innovative solutions that bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI research and real-world applications.

My journey in technology is driven by curiosity and the desire to build systems that make a meaningful impact. From developing AI chatbots that enhance user engagement to creating computer vision systems with exceptional accuracy, I thrive on solving complex challenges with elegant, scalable solutions.

workExperience.title: Python with AIML Developer
workExperience.description: Leading AI chatbot development and backend optimization
achievements: Built AI chatbots using LangChain and Gemini, leading to a 40% boost in user engagement
Developed custom image/video generation tools with Stable Diffusion
Automated tax calculations through a chatbot, cutting manual queries by 50%
Streamlined workflows via Docker and Make.com, increasing team efficiency by 35%
